hero.headline: Think First. Build with AI. Ship with Confidence.
hero.sub: 10 days. Thousands of builders. A global hackathon like no other.
hero.trackHubHelper: We'll notify you when there's one in your city
hero.formNote: You'll get planning templates and updates before the event.

manifesto.p1: In this hackathon, {bold}you design before you build.{/bold} Three days to plan your architecture. Six days to build with any AI tool. One day to prove that thinking first produces better results.
manifesto.p2: {bold}The difference? Here, the plan matters as much as the code.{/bold}
manifesto.bridge: And here's how we prove it:

phases.title: How It Works
phases.p1Desc: Design your project ‚Äî architecture, features, and how you'll know it works. No code yet.
phases.p2Desc: Build using any AI tool. Your plan is locked ‚Äî changes require justification.
phases.p3Desc: Present to global judges. Show how your plan became a product.
phases.note: Solo builders and teams of 2‚Äì5. Join a city hub or participate virtually.

hubs.title: Go Global. Go Local.
hubs.sub: Join a city hub for the full in-person experience, or participate 100% virtually.
hubs.traction: 1 confirmed hub ¬∑ 5 target cities ¬∑ Is yours next?
hubs.ambassadorPitch: Want to bring SpecHack to your city? As a Hub Ambassador, you organize the local experience ‚Äî we provide the playbook, brand assets, and support.
hubs.formSuccess: Thanks! We'll be in touch soon.

sponsors.title: Partner With Us
sponsors.sub: Reach developers who think before they code.
sponsors.prop1: Align your brand with responsible AI development
sponsors.prop2: Every project documents how developers use your tools
sponsors.ngoNote: 404 Tech Found is a registered NGO. Contributions may qualify as CSR/charitable donations depending on jurisdiction.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.a1: Solo and teams of 2‚Äì5 welcome. Find teammates in our Discord.
faq.a2: Architecture, API interfaces, data models, test cases, docs. Templates provided before the event.
faq.a3: Yes, virtual track is fully global.

metadata.title: SpecHack 2026 | Think First, Build with AI
metadata.description: 10-day global hackathon. 3 days of design, 6 days building with AI, 1 day presenting. June 19-28, 2026. Free, hybrid, global.

cards.recruitMore: Want to recruit more? Share your link.
